is this region free?  Klixx to burn games use clone cd and make sure your burner can handle dual layer dvd's.  Also you have to remember that you will have two files one ill be a .iso and the other a .dvd you have to select the .dvd file to burn.  If you really want to save money on disks from bad burns i would suggest downloading a program called mulleter beta 10.  Run this program on the iso images before you burn them and this program will tell you id the image is good and if it is not it will help you fix the image.  Now to Dragfire you have to mod the console by flashing the firmware you can find tutorials to show you exactly how to do this  at this website http://360mods.net/index.php.  You could probably also find a way to download mulleter beta 10 from this website so good luck!!

Why must people always ask "Is this region free" and similar questions.

READ the name of the torrent, It says PAL, wich means this is PAL, NOT Region Free or NTSC, if it had been Region Free or NTSC the torrent would have been named Forza_Motorsport_2_REGION_FREE_XBOX360-GST.

Forza_Motorsport_2_NTSC_XBOX360-GST.

This is not the only game that I've downloaded where people ask those questions.
